topic: Youth unemployment rates are increasing globally. What are the main causes of this problem and what solutions can you suggest?
essayText:
Young people no job big problem now. Getting worse everywhere.

Why happen? Company not want young people want old worker with experience. Young people no experience how get job? Also machine take job. Computer do everything now.

School not good. Teach wrong thing. Student learn but cannot work after finish.

Economy bad so no job. My friend finish university but no job one year already. Very sad.

What to do? Government must help give money company hire young people. School must teach better thing. Young people maybe start business.

So many reason for no job. Need fix fast or big problem future.
weaknesses: Major grammatical errors in every sentence
